content: > I apologize for the inconvenience. It seems there was a mistake with the initial password I provided. Please try this new one [redacted].
message: Dear [Victim's Name], I am very sorry for the inconvenience this has caused. I understand how important security is, and I want to assure you that we take this matter very seriously. Please try the new password I've provided, and let me know if you encounter any further issues. Your security is our top priority, and we are committed to helping you resolve this situation as quickly as possible. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation. Best regards, Akira
